column1: Rule 1: Modifiers containing an amino acid structure with an aromatic side chain
column2: Rule 2: Modifiers with a benzoic acid core and additional strong electron-withdrawing groups
column3: Rule 4: Modifiers with multiple hydroxyl groups in a sugar-like structure
column4: Rule 6: Modifiers with a pyridine ring and hydroxyl groups in specific positions
column5: Rule 8: Modifiers with a formyl group attached to an aromatic ring
